definition: block/gate pillar/pier/classifier for clusters of plants/classifier for rounds in a card game: trick/(archaic) watchtower

sentences.english: By the use of video technology to achieve a collision avoidance warning to the bridge pier.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种利用视频技术实现对桥墩防撞预警的方法。

sentences.english: The second temporary pier was such that its legs straddled the width of the pier.
sentences.chinese: 第二临时墩的立柱间距超过桥墩的宽度。

sentences.english: The pier was lit up along its entire length.
sentences.chinese: 整个桥墩从头到尾都沐浴在灯火之中。

sentences.english: The single span girders are linked with one another and freely supported on top of rigid piers.
sentences.chinese: 桥的邻跨梁相互铰连并自由置放在桥墩的顶面上。
你看见那边桥墩了没有？

sentences.english: Most road bridges have piers rising out of the vally.
sentences.chinese: 很多公路桥的桥墩是从河谷里建造起来的。

sentences.english: The workers were pouring concrete for the bridge when the pier toppled.
sentences.chinese: 倒塌事故发生时，工人们正在给桥墩浇灌混凝土。

sentences.english: The supports required to reach the bottom of the Pacific!
sentences.chinese: 要多高的桥墩立在太平洋底呢？

sentences.english: The pier displacement is a key parameter for analyzing the security of the high pier bridges.
sentences.chinese: 墩顶位移是表征高墩桥桥墩安全的重要参数之一。

sentences.english: Generally, the effect of coupling vibration of all adjacent piers should be considered.
sentences.chinese: 一般情况下，应考虑相邻桥墩的耦联振动影响。

sentences.english: Waves were swashing against the piers.
Floodwaters had loosened piers on the Shitingjiang bridge.
sentences.chinese: 洪水冲毁了石亭江大桥的桥墩。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the cutting blasting demolition of a railway bridge pier.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了某铁路桥桥墩台帽的切割爆破拆除。

sentences.english: A belfry is to be built by the ancient bridge on the canal.
sentences.chinese: 河上有古桥一座，在桥墩边设计钟楼一座。

sentences.english: A protective pier or dock apron used as a buffer against floating ice.
sentences.chinese: 桥墩护槛保护桥椁免受浮冰碰撞的护栏或码头围栏。

sentences.english: The temperature distribution in slab flexible piers and the related factors are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对板壁式柔性桥墩温度场及其影响因素进行了研究。

definition: Da Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
